title: Did the United Nations official say that the nations would disappear if global warming did not retreat by the year 2000?
subtitle: An article published by Associated Press since 1989 has been popular among climate change denials.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: In 1989, a senior United Nations environmental official said: "Entire nations on the planet can be wiped out by rising sea levels if the trend of global warming is not reversed by the year 2000."
